00018 BEHAVIOR_STATUS TurnTowardsTarget::execute(void* agent)
00019 {
00020         GameObject* object = (GameObject*) agent;
00021         GameObject* target = ws->getPlayer();
00022         
00023         CL_Angle angleBetween = ws->angleBetween(object,target);
00024 
00025         //cout << "angleBetween" << angleBetween.to_degrees() << endl;
00026 
00027         if ( angleBetween.to_degrees() < -(speed+1))
00028         {
00029                 ws->rotateObject(object,-speed); //clockwise
00030                 return BT_RUNNING;
00031         }
00032         else if (angleBetween.to_degrees() > speed+1)
00033         {
00034                 ws->rotateObject(object,speed);
00035                 return BT_RUNNING;
00036         }
00037 
00038         else return BT_RUNNING;
00039         
00040 }
